Interface AulaInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Aula, AulaDidattica, Laboratorio
public interface AulaInterface
Defines the contract for Aula, specifying methods to access basic properties and accessories of a Aula. Implementations of this interface represent specific types of Aula such as AulaDidattica or Laboratorio.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    AulaInterface.TipoAula
    Represents the type of classroom, either a Laboratorio or a AulaDidattica.

  • Method Details

    • getNumeroAula

      int getNumeroAula()
      Retrieves the unique identifier number of the classroom.
      Returns:
      The classroom number.

    • getCapienza

      int getCapienza()
      Retrieves the maximum capacity of the classroom.
      Returns:
      The capacity of the classroom.

    • getTipo

      AulaInterface.TipoAula getTipo()
      Gets the type of the classroom.
      Returns:
      The AulaInterface.TipoAula indicating whether the classroom is a LABORATORIO or DIDATTICA.

    • getAccessoriAsListInt

      List<Integer> getAccessoriAsListInt()
      Retrieves the accessories in the classroom as a list of integers.

      Each integer in the list represents the presence (1) or absence (0) of a specific accessory, with the order and meaning defined by the implementing class (e.g., lavagna, proiettore for AulaDidattica).

      Returns:
      A List of integers representing the accessories.

    • getAccessori

      Object getAccessori()
      Retrieves the accessories available in the classroom.

      The specific type of object returned depends on the implementing class (e.g., EnumSet<AccessorioDidattica> for AulaDidattica or EnumSet<AccessorioLaboratorio> for Laboratorio).

      Returns:
      An object representing the set of accessories specific to the classroom type.

    • toJson

      String toJson()
      Converts the classroom object to a JSON string representation.
      Returns:
      A formatted JSON string containing the classroom's properties, including number, capacity, type, and accessories.
